name: Cute girl with uncle's leisure time
name_original: Cute girl with uncle's leisure time
description:
A magical girl just learned fire magic. Fresh out of prison, she is eager to show her strength. It happened that an uncle in the next village had a good relationship with her. Prepare to challenge her. They prepare to fight in four magic forbidden places. See if you can conquer this old man?

This is a magic shooting game, players by releasing different magic to attack the uncle, at the same time need to avoid touching the uncle, because it will make the player lose blood. There are 4 maps in total, and the health of each map uncle varies greatly. The game fails when the player has insufficient blood, and the game wins when the uncle has insufficient blood. Each map has 5 blood points that the player touches and will continue to add blood.

Game Features:
⚪ Female protagonist, sexy and beautiful.
⚪ Gorgeous magic, visual feast.
⚪ Optimized performance for smooth combat

Game play:
⚪ mouse motion vision. WSAD moves.
⚪ left mouse button attack.123 key release skills.
⚪ Uncle surrounded by flames, touch will hurt.
⚪ There are blood packs in the map, you can add blood.
